Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-LTc-3r (D98, Synthetic AMPs, variant of Temporin-LTc, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (82.35%) toTemporin-LTc.Activity: active against S. aureus USA300 MRSA (MIC 12.5 uM) and E. coli (MIC 25 uM). inhibited Human Immunodeficiency Virus Type 1 HIV-1 (EC50 0.83 uM).Toxicity: TC50 8.6 uM in CEM-SS cells.
Literature Information.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Peterkofsky A, Buckheit RW Jr. 2010
Literature Information.Title: Identification of novel human immunodeficiency virus type 1-inhibitory peptides based on the antimicrobial peptide database
